item.title: Cars driving through no entry, 7th July
item.description:
There is no longer a bollard at the end of glenarm road, which is a no through road, so cars and motorbikes have been driving through which is dangerous and poses a risk.

item.title: Dumped Peugeot no mot / rav, 7th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Roberts Close, Poverest, London

item.title: Between the houses and railway in pinned location, 7th July
item.description:
Hello this area has not been taken care of in around 10 years there is overgrown weeds and thorns they are so overgrown that is it breaking down our fences. I try to cut them down each year for her but my nanna is 82 years old and her arthritis can’t handle it anymore and I do not live with her. There are foxes and other animals that are always making lots of noise during the night and defecating in the garden, scaring pets and getting into the sheds. I have tried contacting the railway and they are of no use. Please could this be rectified? Thankyou for reading.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Newbury Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves and mud over and by the drain, 7th July
item.description:
This area in pic is Southey street were I had a slip and fall on 6th July 2025 on my way from the shop at around 19:30.This area is always poorly maintained with leaves and slippery mud and I have been living here since 2021.As it’s a one way bend, you have no choice but to walk in that location to get to my flat from the high street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southey Street, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Frequent fly tip by the same people, 7th July
item.description:
Frequent bulk fly tipping by the same people. It seems possibly likely that they do house clearances, and store what they want in garage No.139 Lucey way Then dump what they dont want by Rail Sidings Rd. They dumped one load last evening (Sunday 6/7/25 ), and another load this evening, they then reversed back along the garage service rd and dumped the rest of their load next to and opposite the skip cupboard next to garage No.139 Lucey Way. Please remove this bulk tip URGENTLY as it is a major fire risk and also attracts scavengers who then strew the mess all over the place. These people are blatantly committing a crime and have no regard for the residents or general public. I have provided enough photo evidence for southwark council to track these people down and to take back the garage from them and to prosecute them

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Rail Sidings Road, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet
